tasks.label: build (dev)
tasks.command: export CC=$(which gcc-12) && export CXX=$(which g++-12) && ~/.cargo/bin/cargo build --color=always --profile dev --features final

tasks.label: test (dev)
tasks.command: export CC=$(which gcc-12) && export CXX=$(which g++-12) && ~/.cargo/bin/cargo test --all --color=always --profile dev --features final

tasks.label: run leopold (dev)
tasks.command: export CC=$(which gcc-12) && export CXX=$(which g++-12) && ~/.cargo/bin/cargo run --color=always --profile dev --features final -- --config ${workspaceRoot}/.testing/dist/authority.toml
